name: Windows Gather Local and Domain Controller Account Password Hashes
author: Carlos Perez <carlos_perez@darkoperator.com>
description:
This will dump local accounts from the SAM Database. If the target
          host is a Domain Controller, it will dump the Domain Account Database using the proper
          technique depending on privilege level, OS and role of the host.

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: GETSYSTEM
options.description: Attempt to get SYSTEM privilege on the target host.
